titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate for 5 years the limitation on expensing certain depreciable business assets.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate for 5 years the limitation on expensing certain depreciable business assets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to suspend until 2015 the dollar limitation, and the reduction in such limitation, on certain depreciable business and investment asssets.
